name: linescript-vscode
description: Language support for LineScript (.lsc, .ls): syntax highlight, snippets, diagnostics, suggestions, and LSP features.

linescript.lscPath.description: Path to LineScript compiler executable. Empty means auto: nearest workspace lsc.exe/lsc (walking up from the file), then PATH fallback.

linescript.backendCompiler.description: Optional backend compiler for checks, passed as '--cc <value>'. Example: clang or gcc.

linescript.maxSpeedDiagnostics.description: If true, include '--max-speed' in diagnostics checks.

linescript.compilerDiagnosticsOnly.description: Use only compiler-authenticated diagnostics from 'lsc --check'. Disable to also include heuristic editor hints/suggestions.

linescript.checkOnSave.description: Run compiler diagnostics when the file is saved.

linescript.extraCheckArgs.description: Additional args appended to 'lsc <file> --check'. Use carefully.

linescript.hintsEnabled.description: Enable user-friendly hints and QoL suggestions in diagnostics.

linescript.styleHintsEnabled.description: Enable optional style hints (semicolon cleanup, c-style reminders, and shorthand suggestions).

linescript.maxHintsPerFile.description: Maximum number of hint/info diagnostics shown per file.

scripts.test: node server/completion_catalog.test.js && node server/formatter.test.js && node server/hints.test.js && node server/hints_stress.test.js && node server/false_positives.test.js
